name: command-not-found.com
description: Lookup tool to find what package you need to install to get a command that is "not found". Includes many linux distros including WSL's flavor of debian.

name: Ninite
description:
"Install and Update All Your Programs at Once
No toolbars. No clicking next. Just pick your apps and go."
seriously, easy installer for most basic apps.

name: WiFi standards list
description: Article on WiFi standards names and code names.
